name: DeadlockIntegrations
title: Deadlock-Mod Integrations (fixed for 1.1)
author: Deadlock989, Shane Madden
description:
Forked this mod until Shane is back on the scene
Adds support in Deadlock's Stacking Beltboxes & Compact Loaders for Bob's mods, FactorioExtended and FactorioExtendedPlus, and Xander's mods.
